original_text:
“To whom will he teach knowledge,
    and to whom will he explain the message?
Those who are weaned from the milk,
    those taken from the breast?
korean_text: 그들이 이르기를 그가 누구에게 지식을 가르치며 누구에게 도를 전하여 깨닫게 하려는가 젖 떨어져 품을 떠난 자들에게 하려는가

sentences.original_text: To whom will he teach knowledge,
and to whom will he explain the message?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 누구에게 그 뜻을 설명할 것인가?

sentences.original_text: Those who are weaned from the milk,
